Package com.sixbank.notificationlibrary.shared.constants

Class TopicConstants

java.lang.Object
com.sixbank.notificationlibrary.shared.constants.TopicConstants
public final class TopicConstants extends Object
Kafka topic names and configuration constants used by the Notification Service.

This utility class organizes topic names into logical groups:

  • Input - Topics that the Notification Service listens to (incoming events)
  • Output - Topics that the Notification Service publishes to (outgoing events)
  • DeadLetter - Topics used to store failed or undeliverable messages
  • Config - Default topic configuration constants

This structure promotes consistency, reuse, and ease of maintenance when dealing with topic names or Kafka topic settings across the service.

Usage Example: 


     String topic = TopicConstants.Input.NOTIFICATION_EVENTS;
     kafkaTemplate.send(topic, message);

To prevent instantiation, this class is marked as final and has a private constructor.
